UniprotID	Q5TA31

EntryName	RN187_HUMAN
ProteinName	E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase RNF187 (EC 2.3.2.27) (RING domain AP1 coactivator 1) (RACO-1) (RING finger protein 187) (RING-type E3 ubiquitin transferase RNF187)
GeneName	RNF187
Length	235
Function	E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase that acts as a coactivator of JUN-mediated gene activation in response to growth factor signaling via the MAP3K1 pathway, independently from MAPK8.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Nucleus
